pages.text: Noble Stage is the third evolution of the Ravenous Maw, marking its ascent into a state of refined lethality. This stage is attained only through the destruction of the Wither;
by drinking in the chaotic, necrotic energies of the three-headed horror, the Maw sheds its common skin and assumes a more regal and devastating presence. This Stage's Feast is Chorus Cracker.
